name: Little Cupcake Mouse
description:
The mice have found a new place to live! They have taken up residence in these mini silicone cake cases, and have a very important message - "Keep Calm and Have a Cupcake"! These would make a perfect Mother's Day or birthday gift, or just as a treat for you.

The Cupcake Mice are made from polymer clay with black onyx eyes. They are holding a placard which is made from laminated gloss paper mounted on a shaped wooden stick. The total height of the mouse is about 6cm (2.4 inches) to the top of the placard. 

The silicone cake case is food grade and can be used and re-used to make real cupcakes, and the mouse will perch quite happily on top of the cupcake (although he might have a nibble!) It can be used safely in the oven, fridge, freezer and dishwasher, and is 2.2cm (0.9 inches) tall.

Each Cupcake Mouse is signed with an artist's mark - a slice of my unique 'QC' monogram cane. They come in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate and will be sent safely by first class post within the UK. For international orders, they will be sent by airmail post, and a tracked and insured service is available for an extra charge.

Because each Cupcake Mouse is a made entirely by hand, each one is a little different.

The Cupcake Mice are available in white or tan - let me know when ordering which colour of mouse you'd like (there's a place to add a comment in Paypal when going through the check out process, or you can email me at kirsten@quernuscrafts.co.uk).

name: Two Cheeky Chimps
description:
"So what exactly are you doing?" says the chimp on the left. "Wmphf lphmm ghwwmph" says the chimp on the right, his mouth too full of toes to answer clearly.

Two Cheeky Chimps is a one off sculpture and one of the latest wee creature designs from Quernus Crafts. The chimps are made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. They are finished with satin varnish, and are mounted on a hand-turned mahogany plinth measuring 9.2cm long by 4cm deep. The total height of the sculpture is about 5.5cm.

Two Cheeky Chimps comes with a signed certificate and will be sent in a sturdy presentation box by first class recorded delivery within the UK, and by International Signed For post for overseas orders.

name: Wooden Display Plinth
description: These display plinths have been specially hand-turned and finished for the Quernus wee creatures by Allan Clark of Beholders-i. They are the perfect way to showcase the wee creatures (and it gives them a better view of what's going on too!) The display plinths are 6cm in diameter in total, with a rebated hand-turned top surface measuring 4cm in diameter. They are approximately 2cm tall. Available in mahogany or gloss white finish. The mahogany display plinth has been waxed and stained. The gloss white display plinth is turned pine finished with gloss white paint. To fix the wee creatures to the plinths, apply a small amount of strong clear adhesive glue to the bottom of the wee creature, and then press firmly to the top of the plinth. Leave to dry completely. When bought individually, the display plinths will be sent out by second class post within the UK, and by airmail post for international orders. When bought with a wee creature, there are no additional shipping costs.

name: Baby Penguin
description:
To celebrate a new addition to the family, what better way than to say it with a Penguin?

Baby Penguin is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. Perched on a white hand-turned plinth, which measures 6cm in diameter, they also have either a pink or a blue blanket with matching dummy (or pacifier).

Baby Penguin comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate and will be sent safely by first class post within the UK (and by airmail post for international orders).

Available in either Pink or Blue - other colours available on request.

name: Christmas Mice Special Edition Giclée Print by Laura Frame
description: This beautiful illustration was originally part of a series of Advent Drawings by Laura Frame inspired by the Quernus mice. This print is available in A5 (148mm x 210mm, 5.83" x 8.27"), and has been signed by Laura Frame. This is a high quality giclée print on archival matte paper, and comes either mounted on cream board measuring 205mm x 255mm so it is ready to frame, or it is available without a mount (save £2). The photo of the framed print is for illustration purposes only - frame not included. Postage within the UK is by first class post.

name: Quernus Crafts 2014 Slim Calendar
description:
For the first time, you can now have a Quernus moment every day of the year!

The 2014 Quernus Calendar contains 13 of my favourite wee creatures pictured in full colour in a slim calendar measuring 13.6cm x 30cm. 

They will come wrapped in cellophane and safely posted in a hard-backed envelope.

name: Three Wise Mice
description: These little grey mice are acting out the well known Japanese saying, "see no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil", although it should really be "squeak no evil"! Mounted attractively on a hand-turned mahogany plinth, they will sit happily on your shelf or desk, and will probably make you giggle too! Made from polymer clay with black onyx eyes, each mouse sits 3.5cm (1.4 inches) tall and 2.5cm (1 inch) wide. They are fixed to a mahogany plinth which measures 10cm long by 4cm deep, and the overall height of the sculpture is about 5cm. Three Wise Mice come in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate of authenticity. UK orders will be sent out safely by first class post, and international orders will be sent by airmail post. Also available: Three Tiny Wise Mice Three Wise Moles

name: Three Tiny Wise Mice
description: I'm delighted to introduce the Tiny version of the Three Wise Mice! These mice are acting out the well known Japanese saying, "see no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil", although it should really be "squeak no evil"! Mounted attractively on a hand-turned mahogany plinth, they will sit happily on your shelf or desk and will be quite the conversation piece! Made from polymer clay with black onyx eyes, each mouse sits 2.5cm (1 inch) tall 2cm (0.8 inches) wide. They are fixed to a mahogany plinth which measures 8cm long by 4cm deep. The overall height of the sculpture is about 5cm. Three Tiny Wise Mice come in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate of authenticity. UK orders will be sent out safely by first class post, and international orders will be sent by airmail post. Also available: The slightly larger Three Wise Mice.

name: Little Mouse with Glass Cherry Sculpture
description: This is a unique sculpture, the result of a beautiful collaboration between Quernus Crafts and Phoenix Glass. Little Cherry Mouse is holding a beautiful lampwork glass cherry with a sweeping glass stem, handmade specially for the mice by the very talented Paul Jones. Little Cherry Mouse is fixed to a hand-turned mahogany plinth, and the total height of the sculpture is about 7.5cm (3 inches) to the top of the cherry stem. Little Cherry Mouse is made from polymer clay with with semi-precious black onyx eyes. His tail is strengthened with wire armature. Because each Little Cherry Mouse is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different. Little Cherry Mouse comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate. He will be sent safely by first class recorded delivery post within the UK. For international orders, he will be send using a tracked and insured service. To see other collaborations, click here. Other glass fruits are available and will be listed separately. If you have any special requests, please contact me.

name: Tiny Rainbow Love Mouse Shelf Ornament
description: These Tiny Rainbow Love Mice just love being perched up on their hand painted wooden plinths - they do like knowing what's going on in the world! Tiny Rainbow Love Mouse is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. She is holding a little love heart which is colour matched to the plinth she is standing on. The total height of the sculpture is approximately 5.5cm. Tiny Rainbow Love Mouse comes in a smart presentation box and will be sent safely by first class post within the UK, and by airmail post for international orders. Sold individually. Because each mouse is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different. You can also buy the full set of 12 Tiny Rainbow Love Mice for £120 and save £24! Tiny Rainbow Love Mice are also available without their plinths - these will be listed separately (or drop me a line if you have any questions).

name: Little Mouse with Glass Apple
description: This is another unique sculpture, the result of a beautiful collaboration between Quernus Crafts and Phoenix Glass. Little Apple Mouse is holding a beautiful lampwork glass apple, handmade specially for the mice by the very talented Paul Jones. Little Glass Apple Mouse is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. He is fixed to a hand-turned mahogany plinth which is 6cm in diameter. The total height of the sculpture is about 5.5cm tall. Little Glass Apple Mouse comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate. He will be sent safely by first class recorded delivery post within the UK. For international orders, he will be send using a tracked and insured service. The glass apples are available in red and green. Because each Mouse and each Apple are made entirely by hand, each one will be a little different. Paul has made a number of other beautiful glass pieces for the mice - you can find them here.

name: Wee Sheep Ornament
description:
Wee Sheep is a delightful sculpture - the sheep is completely handmade from polymer clay, with each strand of hair individually applied, and he is fixed to a hand-turned mahogany plinth which measures 6cm in diameter. The total height of the sculpture is approximately 5cm. 

Because each Wee Sheep is individually made, each one is a little different. 

Available in white or black. Wee Black Sheep is mounted on his own hand-turned plinth finished in white gloss. 

Wee Sheep comes safely packaged in his own smart presentation box, and he will be sent safely by first class post within the UK. International orders are sent by airmail post.

name: Mistletoe Mice under Glass Arch
description: Another unique collaboration with the ever talented Paul Jones of Phoenix Glass. Paul has made a beautiful platform for these two loved up Mice! The red love heart base is 8cm wide and just over 6cm deep. It stands nearly 9cm tall, and the sides of the arch are made using delicate filigree green fused glass, with mistletoe springs crowning the top. The bunch of mistletoe hanging from the apex of the arch are made from polymer clay, and the mice are not attached to the platform, although they are attached to each other ;) This sculpture comes safely packaged in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate, and will be sent by special delivery within the UK (overseas orders will go by international signed for post).

name: Chorister Mouse with Stained Glass Window
description: This is a wonderful collaboration with the very talented Paul Jones of Phoenix Glass, and there are only a small number of these unique pieces made for Christmas 2013. Chorister Mouse stands just over 4cm tall, and he is happily perched on a beautifully crafted miniature stained glass window which is 10cm tall and 7cm at its widest point. The window can also double as a tea light holder if the mouse fancies a change of scenery. This year, Paul has used a bold modern stained glass effect, and the Chorister Mice are available in blue or red robes (while stocks last). On the front of Chorister Mouse's choir book is a clay panel which matches the stained glass, which has been created using a millefiori technique. Chorister Mouse is signed with my artist's mark and comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate of authenticity. He will be sent safely by first class recorded delivery post within the UK, and by a tracked and/or signed for service for international orders. Because each Chorister Mouse and Window are made by hand, each one is a little different. Also available: Angel Mouse with Stained Glass Window Set of 4 Chorister Mice with Triple Panel Window

name: Angel Mouse with Stained Glass Window
description: This is a wonderful collaboration with the very talented Paul Jones of Phoenix Glass, and there are only a small number of these unique pieces made for Christmas 2013. Angel Mouse stands about 4.5cm tall, and she is happily perched on a beautifully crafted fused glass miniature stained glass window which is 7.5cm tall and 5cm at its widest point. The window can also double as a tea light holder if the mouse fancies a change of scenery. Angel Mouse is wearing a glitter white gown with gold trim, and she is holding a gold harp with real wire strings. She has large wings made from shaped wire and pearlescent resin, a golden halo, and long golden hair. Her gown is finished off with a white organza bow. Angel Mouse is signed with my artist's mark and comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate of authenticity. She will be sent safely by first class recorded delivery post within the UK, and by a tracked and/or signed for service for international orders. Because each Angel Mouse and Window are made by hand, each one is a little different.

name: Santa Mouse with Sleigh and Reindeer
description: New for 2013, Santa Mouse has had his very own sleigh and reindeer created for him by JS Miniatures. Santa Mouse is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. He stands about 3.5cm tall, and has a lovely bushy white beard, a red coat and trousers with a black belt and gold buckle, and shiny black boots. The Sleigh and Reindeer are hand painted 1.5mm laser cut ply wood. The Sleigh is 3" (7.5cm) in total, and the two Reindeer are 6.5cm at the tallest point. The Sleigh has a small fixed polymer clay cushion so Santa Mouse can see where he's going! Santa Mouse is signed with my artist's mark, and the piece will be safely wrapped in a sturdy presentation box, and will be sent safely by first class recorded delivery post within the UK, and by international signed for post for international orders. Because because Santa Mouse is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different. You can also buy the Sleigh and Reindeer kits ready to be assembled and painted from JS Miniatures.

name: Set of 4 Quernus Christmas Cards - Wee Creatures
description: New for 2013 are these lovely Christmas cards with exclusive Quernus Crafts wee creatures! Inside each card is the message "Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year". Included in this set are the following designs: Christmas Penguins Mistletoe Polar Bear Christmas Bauble Mice Decorating the Tree The cards are printed on 260gsm card stock and are A6 size (dimensions 148mm x 105mm). They come complete with white envelopes and are sealed in a clear protective sleeve. Also available: Set of 4 Quernus Christmas Cards - Laura Frame Illustrations

name: Christmas Mole with Mistletoe
description:
The Moles are getting into the festive spirit this year!

This wee Christmas Mole is holding a little sprig of mistletoe, and he'd like to give you a wee kiss to celebrate Christmas! He is also sporting a rather natty Santa hat, complete with fluffy pom-pom. 

Christmas Mole is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes - his 'fur' has been created using a millefiori technique, and he's been finished with a coat of satin varnish.

Christmas Mole is firmly fixed to a hand-turned, stained and waxed mahogany display plinth, which is about 6cm in diameter. The total height of the sculpture is about 5.5cm.

Because each Christmas Mole is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different.  

Christmas Mole comes safely packaged in a sturdy presentation box with a signed certificate, and will be sent safely by first class post within the UK, and by airmail post for international orders.

name: Set of 4 Quernus Christmas Cards - Laura Frame Illustration
description: A chance to buy a set of all four of the specially commissioned exclusive designs by Laura Frame Illustrations based on original Quernus sculptures. Included in this set are the following designs: Santa Mouse & Co Mistletoe Mice Snail Sleigh Wee Robins (can fly) The cards are printed on 260gsm card stock and are A6 size (dimensions 148mm x 105mm). They come complete with white envelopes and are sealed in a clear protective sleeve. Also available: Set of 4 Quernus Christmas Cards - Wee Creatures

name: Christmas Bauble Mouse Shelf Ornament - tan mouse
description:
Christmas Bauble Mouse is proudly sitting on his very own hand-turned, hand-stained and waxed display plinth, and he's very chuffed with his Christmas bauble!

Christmas Bauble Mouse is made from tan polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. He is hugging a small mouth blown glass bauble ornament 2cm in diameter, which is decorated with a spring of polymer clay mistletoe.  The plinth is about 6cm in diameter, and the total height of the sculpture is 5.5cm.

Christmas Bauble Mouse comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate and will be sent safely by first class post within the UK. International orders are sent by airmail post.

Because each Christmas Bauble Mouse is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different.

The baubles are available in red, gold, silver and white.

name: Christmas Mole with Snowflake
description:
The Moles are getting into the festive spirit this year!

This wee Christmas Mole is holding a Tibetan silver snowflake, and is also sporting a rather natty Santa hat, complete with fluffy pom-pom! Christmas Mole is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes - his 'fur' has been created using a millefiori technique, and he's been finished with a coat of satin varnish.

Christmas Mole is firmly fixed to a hand-turned, stained and waxed mahogany display plinth, which is about 6cm in diameter. The total height of the sculpture is about 5.5cm.

Because each Christmas Mole is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different.  The snowflakes are also a little different, as snowflakes often are.

Christmas Mole comes safely packaged in a sturdy presentation box with a signed certificate, and will be sent safely by first class post within the UK, and by airmail post for international orders.

name: Little Mouse with Pencil Notebook
description: Another new design for 2013, this notebook has a printed cover of an original Quernus design - a little mouse with glasses holding a blue pencil. The notebook is A7 size (approximately 72 x 105mm), and has 35 plain sheets - better for making notes than keeping a real mouse in your pocket! For other available notebooks, click here.

name: I Heart Books Bookmark
description:
New for 2013, this lovely bookmark is based on a unique sculpture I made with the mice playing around on hand-cut and painted wooden letters saying "I [heart] Books"!

The bookmark measures 20cm x 5.5cm and is made from 350gsm double laminated silk art card. There is a little red heard charm threaded through the top of each bookmark, and the reverse is printed with my Quernus logo and a QR code to my website (in case you feel like a midnight fix of cuteness whilst reading!)

name: Tiny Holly Mouse Shelf Ornament
description: This Tiny Holly Mouse will perch very happily on a shelf or mantelpiece - as long as he has a good view of what's going on! Tiny Holly Mouse is made from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes. He is holding a clay sprig of holly which has been finished with satin varnish. He is securely fixed to a hand-painted wooden cube which is an inch in size. The total height of the sculpture is about 5.5cm tall. The plinths are available in red and gold (while stocks last). Because each Tiny Holly Mouse is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different. He will be sent safely by first class post within the UK, and by airmail post for international orders. Also available: Tiny Holly Mouse Tree Decoration

name: Tiny Baby Mouse on Plinth
description:
New for 2013, these Tiny Baby Mice are the perfect way to celebrate the first Christmas of a new addition to the family!

Each Tiny Baby Mouse is holding a little star and has a matching dummy. The little cubes are hand painted to match. The total height is approximately 5.5cm tall. The Tiny Baby Mice are made entirely by hand from polymer clay with semi-precious black onyx eyes.

Because each Tiny Baby Mouse is made by hand, each one is a little different.

name: Wee Bat
description: Just in time for Halloween, these Wee Bats have fluttered in looking rather more cute than scary. Made from polymer clay, they have semi-precious black onyx beads for eyes. Their wings are strengthened with wire armature and they are finished with satin varnish. They are approximately 2.5cm tall and 5cm wide from wing tip to wing tip. Each Wee Bat is signed with my artist's mark and comes in a smart presentation box with a signed certificate. He will be posted safely by first class post within the UK, and by airmail post for international orders. Because each Wee Bat is made entirely by hand, each one in a little different. Sold individually. For other bats, visit here.

name: "I Dig You" Love Mole Valentine Card
description: This card is based on the original Quernus Wee Love Mole design, and is printed on heavyweight 340gsm stock with a light satin finish, and left uncoated on the inside. The card measures 10.5cm wide x 14.8cm tall (4.13 inches x 5.82 inches), which is A6 or postcard size. It comes with a white envelope and protective clear sleeve, and will be packaged safely in a hard backed sturdy envelope. UK orders will be sent by first class post, and by airmail post for international orders. For other cards, prints, notebooks and bookmarks, click here. Also available for adoption: Wee Love Mole

name: "Clever Spud" Graduation Mole Congratulations Card
description: This card is based on the original Quernus Wee Graduation Mole design, and is printed on heavyweight 340gsm stock with a light satin finish, and left uncoated on the inside. The card measures 10.5cm wide x 14.8cm tall (4.13 inches x 5.82 inches), which is A6 or postcard size. It comes with a white envelope and protective clear sleeve, and will be packaged safely in a hard backed sturdy envelope. UK orders will be sent by first class post, and by airmail post for international orders. For other cards, prints, notebooks and bookmarks, click here. Also available for adoption: Graduation Mole

name: Unpainted Rustic Wooden Display Unit - Free Shipping
description: These wooden display units have been left unpainted for you to add your creativity and create your own unique display unit. As can been seen from the picture, the unit will be in need of some TLC and some of the sections are not geometrically true, and this is reflected in the price. But we feel this just adds to their ‘shabby chic’ character and would still house your wee creatures beautifully! The unit has two hanging hooks fixed to the back, so the unit can be either free standing or mounted on a wall. Dimensions: Total overall width: approximately 22cm Total overall height: approximately 20cm Total depth: approximately 3cm The picture shows the approximately measurements of the internal compartments (this shows a hand painted cream example of the display unit). The price includes shipping by second class post within the UK only. For overseas orders, please contact me for a shipping estimate. This display unit will shipped by Jackie Newberry direct, and therefore combined shipping is not available for this item. Also available: Wooden Hand-painted Display Unit

name: "Happy Easter" Card - Two Mice with Easter Eggs
description: This card is based on an original Quernus Easter Egg Mice design, and is printed on premium glossy 350 g/m2 card. The card is blank inside for your own message. The card measures 10.7cm wide x 13.6cm tall (4.2 inches x 5.4 inches), which is A6 or postcard size. It comes with a white envelope and protective clear sleeve, and will be packaged safely in a hard backed sturdy envelope. UK orders will be sent by first class post, and by airmail post for international orders. For other cards, prints, notebooks and bookmarks, click here.

name: "Together" Valentine Anniversary Wedding Card
description: This card is based on an original Quernus Love Mouse Couple design, and is printed on premium glossy 350 g/m2 card, which is blank inside for your own message. The card measures 10.7cm wide x 13.6cm tall (4.2 inches x 5.4 inches), which is A6 or postcard size. It comes with a white envelope and protective clear sleeve, and will be packaged safely in a hard backed sturdy envelope. UK orders will be sent by first class post, and by airmail post for international orders. Also available to adopt: Love Mouse Couple

name: "I Love You" Valentine Card
description: This card is based on an original Quernus Rose Mouse design, and is printed on premium glossy 350 g/m2 card, which is blank inside for your own message. The card measures 10.7cm wide x 13.6cm tall (4.2 inches x 5.4 inches), which is A6 or postcard size. It comes with a white envelope and protective clear sleeve, and will be packaged safely in a sturdy envelope. UK orders will be sent by first class post, and by airmail post for international orders. Also available to adopt: Tall Mouse with Red Rose

name: Teacup Mouse Card
description: This gorgeous illustration from Laura Frame, based on the original Teacup Mouse by Quernus Crafts, is now available as a greetings card, which is perfect for any special occasion. The card measures 105mm x 148mm, and is a thick 350gsm with a light satin coating on the outside. The inside is blank for your own message. The card comes in a clear cellophane bag with its own white envelope, and will be sent by first class post in the UK. International orders will be sent by airmail post. This design is also available as a Giclee Print, and you can adopt the original Teacup Mice sculptures too.

name: Love Mouse Couple Valentine Card
description: This gorgeous illustration from Laura Frame, based on the original Love Mouse Couple by Quernus Crafts, is now available as a greetings card. The card measures 105mm x 148mm, and is a thick 350gsm with a light satin coating on the outside. The inside is blank for your own message. The card comes in a clear cellophane bag with its own white envelope, and will be sent by first class post in the UK. International orders will be sent by airmail post. This design is also available as a Giclee Print, and you can buy the original Love Mouse Couple sculpture too.

name: Love Bunny Valentine Card
description: This gorgeous illustration from Laura Frame, based on the original Wee Love Bunny by Quernus Crafts, is now available as a greetings card. The card measures 105mm x 148mm, and is a thick 350gsm with a light satin coating on the outside. The inside is blank for your own message. The card comes in a clear cellophane bag with its own white envelope, and will be sent by first class post in the UK. International orders will be sent by airmail post. This design is also available as a Giclee Print.

name: Any 2 Quernus Tea Towels - save £2
description: This listing is for any two of the exclusive Tea Towel designs by Laura Frame based on original sculptures by Quernus Crafts. Choose from the Mouse and Snail designs - you can select one of each, or two of one design, and save £1 on the individual price. The tea towels are high quality 100% pure white cotton, made in the UK. They measure approximately 51cm x 71cm. Laura's designs just leap off the fabric, and the repeating designs will brighten up any kitchen! Also available to buy individually.

name: Snail Tea Towel
description: This wonderful Snail tea towel will cheer up the gloomiest kitchen! This tea towel is part of a series of exclusive designs by ,a href="http://www.lauraframe.co.uk/" target="_blank">Laura Frame based on original Quernus sculptures. The tea towels are high quality 100% pure white cotton, made in the UK. They measure approximately 51cm x 71cm. Laura's designs just leap off the fabric, and the repeating apple snail design will make drying the designs an absolutely pleasure! Also available: Mouse Tea Towel Special offer - buy two Tea Towels and save £2!

name: Mouse Tea Towel
description: This is one of my favourite designs in the series of exclusive illustrations by Laura Frame based on original Quernus sculptures. The tea towels are high quality 100% pure white cotton, made in the UK. They measure approximately 51cm x 71cm. Laura's design just leaps off the towel, and the repeating mouse design will brighten any kitchen! Also available: Snail Tea Towel Special offer - buy any two tea towels and save £2!

name: Mouse with Cake Notebook
description: This little mouse is rather hungry, but can't quite reach the slice of cake! This design is part of a specially commissioned range of designs by Laura Frame Illustrations based on original sculptures by Quernus Crafts. This is a high quality notebook with 35 sheets, with pages alternating between ruled and plain, making it perfect for sketching and journalling. It measures 14cm x 14cm. Other available designs: Knitting Snail Baby Mice Two Snails

name: Knitting Snail Notebook
description: This Knitting Snail is happily trundling along the front of this notebook, leaving a row of neat stitches behind her. This design is part of a specially commissioned range of designs by Laura Frame Illustrations based on original sculptures by Quernus Crafts. This is a high quality notebook with 35 sheets, with pages alternating between ruled and plain, making it perfect for sketching and journalling. It measures 14cm x 14cm, and has a matching illustration by Laura Frame on the back cover. Other available designs: Two Snails Baby Mice Mouse with Cake

name: Baby Mice Notebook
description: Two cute baby mice are happily playing on the front of this lovely notebook. This design is part of a specially commissioned range of designs by Laura Frame Illustrations based on original sculptures by Quernus Crafts. This is a high quality notebook with 35 sheets, with pages alternating between ruled and plain, making it perfect for sketching and journalling. It measures 14cm x 14cm. Other available designs: Knitting Snail Two Snails Mouse with Cake

name: Two Snails Notebook
description: These two colourful Snails are happily moseying along the front of this lovely notebook. This design is part of a specially commissioned range of designs by Laura Frame Illustrations based on original sculptures by Quernus Crafts. This is a high quality notebook with 35 sheets, with pages alternating between ruled and plain, making it perfect for sketching and journalling. It measures 14cm x 14cm, and has another unique illustration by Laura Frame on the back cover. Other available designs: Knitting Snail Baby Mice Mouse with Cake

name: Snail Mug
description: This lovely Snail mug will make sure you drink your tea or coffee very slowly :) This is a 10oz mug with an exclusive illustration by Laura Frame based on an original Quernus Snail, Lydia the Apple Snail. It has been printed using a dye sublimation process which involves fusing inks deeply into the mug (unlike a transfer) using a heat press, which produces vibrant colours that do not fade over time. Also available: Party Mice Mug.

name: Party Mice Mug
description: The mice are having a party on a mug near you! This is a 10oz mug with an exclusive illustration by Laura Frame based on original Quernus mice. It has been printed using a dye sublimation process which involves fusing inks deeply into the mug (unlike a transfer) using a heat press, which produces vibrant colours that do not fade over time. Also available: Snail Mug.

name: Wee Pigling
description: Piglings were the first Quernus design and still one of the best! Wee Piglings measure approximately 3cm wide and 2cm tall and have black onyx eyes. The last picture shows the difference in size between Piglings and Wee Piglings. Because Wee Piglings are individually handmade, each one is a little different. They are each signed with an artist's mark - a slice of my unique 'QC' cane. Wee Piglings come in their own smart presentation box with a signed certificate, and are sent safely by first class post within the UK. International orders are sent by airmail post - a tracked and insured service is available for an extra charge. Sold individually. Also available: Piglings Pigling Set (save £2)

name: Rainbow Bookling Bookmark
description:
This Rainbow Bookling will cheer you up whatever you're reading.

Made from a millefiori bullseye rainbow cane, each rainbow slice has been carefully trimmed and finished with gloss varnish. The rainbow measures about 2cm wide and 1cm tall, and it's tail is a sky blue thin waxed cord about 30cm long.

Because each Bookling is made entirely by hand, each one is a little different.

Each Rainbow Bookling is mounted on a lovely presentation card  with care instructions on the reverse.

name: Set of Four Postcards
description:
A set of four postcards based on original Quernus designs - perfect for sending a note to someone special.

The postcards measure 10.5cm x 14.8cm and are made with high quality 350gsm card stock, printed by Moo.com. The reverse is blank for your message

The four designs included in this pack are:

Bumble Mouse
Rainbow Balloon Mice
Flowerpot Mice
Little Old Mice
